00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_NECESSARY_PARAMETERS_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_NECESSARY_PARAMETERS_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00026 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00027 
00028 #include <boost/assign.hpp>
00029 
00032 namespace clpp {
00033 
00036 namespace detail {
00037 
00038 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00039 
00040 using namespace boost::assign;
00041 
00046 class necessary_parameters_checker : public checker {
00047 public:
00048     necessary_parameters_checker( const parameters&                    registered_parameters
00049                                   , const parameter_parts_extractor&   extractor
00050                                   , const std::string&                 name_value_separator ) :
00051             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {}
00052 public:
00053     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00054         str_storage names_that_should_be = collect_names_of_necessary_parameters();  
00055         remove_names_of_inputed_necessary_parameters( inputed_parameters, names_that_should_be );
00056         if ( !names_that_should_be.empty() ) {
00057             notify_about_missing_of_necessary_parameters( names_that_should_be );   
00058         } else {}
00059     }
00060 private:
00061     str_storage collect_names_of_necessary_parameters() const {
00062         str_storage names;
00063         BOOST_FOREACH ( const parameter& registered_parameter, registered_parameters ) {
00064             if ( registered_parameter.is_necessary ) {
00065                 names += registered_parameter.short_name;
00066             } else {}
00067         }
00068         return names;
00069     }
00070     
00071     void remove_names_of_inputed_necessary_parameters( const str_storage& inputed_parameters
00072                                                        , str_storage&     names_that_should_be ) const {
00073         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& inputed_parameter, inputed_parameters ) {
00074             const std::string name = extractor.extract_name_from( inputed_parameter );
00075             detail::delete_element( names_that_should_be, name );
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     void notify_about_missing_of_necessary_parameters( const str_storage& names_that_should_be ) const {
00080         std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "Parameter ";
00081         
00082         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& name, names_that_should_be ) {
00083             what_happened += "'" + name + "', ";
00084         }
00085         boost::erase_last( what_happened, ", " );
00086         
00087         if ( 1 == names_that_should_be.size() ) {
00088             what_happened += " is defined as necessary, but it missed!";
00089         } else {
00090             boost::replace_first( what_happened, "Parameter", "Parameters" );
00091             what_happened += " are defined as necessary, but they missed!";
00092         }
00093 
00094         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00095     }
00096 };
00097 
00098 } // namespace detail
00099 } // namespace clpp
00100 
00101 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_NECESSARY_PARAMETERS_HPP
